page.title: 16LANGUAGE
page.content: The Library in Maghull is quite popular with approx. lO,OOO members with a greater number of adults than children. The library was built inh l940 and extended in l944. A mobile famility is also available for older residents who are unable to travel. It contains 34,830 books and Mr.Dowling, the librarian chooses half the yearly allocation and Southport library choose the other half. The most popular books borrowed are novels and a copy may last as long as 5 years before it deteriorates to the point of replacement. Other facilities include an order system for sheet music (which is sent from Crosby) and a computer controlled filing system and index catalogue.
